text: @SaraCarterDC @CNN @realDonaldTrump You call yourself award winning? If @cnn didn’t exist the #covid19 cases would be 50 million, the fact that you just hash tagged a racial slur makes you just as bad as him....I can’t wait til #AsianAmericans vote for @JoeBiden who is #NOTARACIST
